name: [CEB] - Cyborg Exploding Bunnies
description:
[CEB] - Cyborg Exploding Bunnies is a 4 player free-for-all party game made in Game Maker Studio 1.4 that won ShefJam V. 

***REQUIRES 4 XBOX 360/One CONTROLLERS/ PEOPLE TO BE PLAYED***

Your bunny is overcharged. Drain power from your battery by shooting it at your friends to charge theirs. At the end of the time limit the bunny with the least overcharged battery shall prevail and the others shall perish. Featuring:

7 original music tracks including one famous rearrangement

5 different stages

4 player chaotic action

Credits:

Owen Lyons - Programming, Music and Design

Guru - Art, Map layouts and Design

Anete Zepa - Design

Game made in GameMaker Studio 1.4

Music made in Famitracker

Art made in Gimp 2
